egr221a.jazzlib

Class HuffmanCompressor

  • java.lang.Object
    • egr221a.jazzlib.HuffmanCompressor

  • public class HuffmanCompressor
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the HuffmanCompressor class. This class is not thread safe. This is inherent in the API, due to the split of deflate and setInput.
    Author:
    Jochen Hoenicke
